title: Web Apps
subtext: Software applications accessed through a web browser
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Web Apps
texts: Web applications, or web apps, are software programs that run on a web server and are accessed through a web browser. They can perform a wide range of tasks, from simple forms and content management to complex business processes.
Web apps are popular for their accessibility, as they can be used on any device with an internet connection and a browser, without needing to install the application locally.
